price: Kuma wata jama'a daga cikinku, su kasance suna kira zuwa ga alhẽri, kuma suna umurnida alhẽri, kuma suna hani dagaabin da ake ƙi. Kuma waɗannan, sũ ne mãsu cin nasara.
arabic: وَلۡتَكُن مِّنكُمۡ أُمَّةٞ يَدۡعُونَ إِلَى ٱلۡخَيۡرِ وَيَأۡمُرُونَ بِٱلۡمَعۡرُوفِ وَيَنۡهَوۡنَ عَنِ ٱلۡمُنكَرِۚ وَأُوْلَٰٓئِكَ هُمُ ٱلۡمُفۡلِحُونَ

version.title: Hausa language - Abu Bakr Jomy
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Hausa by Abu Bakr Mahmoud Jomy. Corrected by supervision of Rowwad Translation Center. The original translation is available for suggestions, continuous evaluation and development.

meta.transliteration: waltakun minkum ummatun yadʿūna ilā al-khayri wayamurūna bil-maʿrūfi wayanhawna ʿani al-munkari wa-ulāika humu al-muf'liḥūna
